name: Little Panda's Giant Day
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for Trijam #101: Binary!

Help the panda have a great, balanced day, by guiding them in deciding whether to eat bamboo, or take a nap! There are only two choices.

There isn't an end state and I haven't really figured out the best balance, but I think there could be potential in this game later on with story elements added to actually have some depth beyond just balancing the stats as it is now. Still, hope you enjoy the excellent visuals by @michaelfirman and the music by Ruinaerr!
